job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related fields with IT experience

secondary: Excellent verbal and written communication skills
all: Excellent verbal and written communication skills

jd:
Title: Senior .Net Developer - Hybrid - w2 or 1099
Location: Indianapolis, IN, USA
Length: Long term
Restriction: W2 only

Description:
Interview Type: Webcam Interview
*** Very long term project expect to go for 4+ years ***
*** Hybrid ***
*** Possible contract to hire***
Local candidates to IN only ***

Short Description:
Senior .NET developer to work building a new CSHCS Web application.

Job Description:
The manager has indicated the position is a possible contract to hire opportunity for eligible candidates only. Candidates presented must be eligible for full time hire, without requiring sponsorship.

Responsible to analyze existing application at Indiana State Department of Health towards building new Web application. Developer will work with PM, other developers, business analysts, and functional team members on the project activities.

Essential Duties / Responsibilities:
Responsible for complete SDLC for project assignment and participate in full development life cycle including requirements analysis and design.
Working with technical and functional staff on detailed business requirements, understanding business processes and technology, agency standards, federal and state policies to align with projects goals.
Write technical specifications based on conceptual design and stated business requirements.
Use object oriented techniques and best practices for design, development, unit testing, and deployment.
Development of code along with unit testing strategy & plans.
Use Microsoft .NET Framework and a supported MVC framework, C# programming language to development of the applications.
Work with Project Manager to ensure project plan is maintained and project milestones are being met.
Work with PM, technical staff, and end user to prototype, refine, test, and debug programs to meet needs of the application.
Have ability to work independently with less guidance and work with ISDH externals partners as needed.
Take agency web applications architecture and business decisions into consideration for design.
Have ability to work independently and under general supervision with latitude for independent judgement.

Required Skills:
Working experience with ASP.NET. 10 Years
Working experience with C#, MVC 5 Years
Work experience in analysis and addressing security related issues for applications built in multiple languages. 5 Years
Working experience with Oracle. 5 Years
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or related fields with IT experience.

Highly desired Skills:
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or related fields with IT experience.
Healthcare EDI experience
Expert understanding of SDLC
Current working experience with Web Services.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to solve complex programming issues.
Experience in Health Industry is a plus.
